page.text:
All Modules for "FillerEX"
- Filling Module - Erasing Module - Removing(Bottom to Top) Module - Removing(Top to Bottom) Module - Flattening Module - Hole Filling Module - Under Filling Module - Box Module - Wall Module - Flooring Module - Placing Torch Module - Towering Module - Erasing Liquid Module - Hoe Module - Quarry Module

page.title: Filling Module
page.text: Filling the area you wanted to with specified block which you put into "Filling Resources" inventory. If any Mob was in the area kill the Mob(s) first then start filling.
FillerEX

page.title: Erasing Module
page.text: Erase all blocks in the area you limited without block updating. "End Portal" and "FillerEX" are NOT erase automatically.
FillerEX

page.title: Remover(Bottom to Top) Module
page.text: Remove all blocks in the area you limited with blocks dropping into items. All requid blocks such as water, lava, and any other requids from other MODs can NOT be erased unless you put enough "sand" block(s) into "Filling Resources" inventory.
FillerEX

page.title: Remover(Top to Bottom) Module
page.text: Remove all blocks in the area you limited with blocks dropping into items but those disappearing in just 1 second.
FillerEX

page.title: Flattening Module
page.text: Flattening area you limited. All blocks in the area are automatically erased. If there were holes(only holes straight down) those are NOT automatically filled unless you put enough block(s) into "Filling Resources" inventory.
FillerEX

page.title: Hole Filling Module
page.text: Filling holes with blocks in the "Filling Resources" inventory. You don't need Y coordinate.
FillerEX

page.title: Under Filling Module
page.text: Filling all empty spaces 1 block below you limited down to Y=1.
FillerEX

page.title: Box Module
page.text: Creating a box with blocks you put into "Filling Resources" inventory.
FillerEX

page.title: Wall Module
page.text: Creating a wall with blocks you put into "Filling Resources" inventory.
FillerEX

page.title: Flooring Module
page.text: Replacing blocks of the area 1 block lower you limited to blocks in "Filling Resources" inventory. Blocks already there can be erased automatically.
FillerEX

page.title: Placing Torch Module
page.text: Placing torches evenly in the area you limited. Origin space between torches is 6 but you can set as you want in config file. You need to put blocks which you want to place into "Filling Resources" inventory.
FillerEX

page.title: Towering Module
page.text: Creating a tower of block you put into "Filling Resources" inventory.
FillerEX

page.title: Erasing Liquid Module
page.text: Erasing all liquid blocks in the area you limited.
FillerEX

page.title: Hoe Module
page.text: Hoe the all dirt 1 block below you limited.
FillerEX

page.title: Quarry Module
page.text: Erase all blocks 1 block below you limited down to Y=1. If there were no blocks on Y=0 those are automatically filled with bedrock.
FillerEX
